components/javascript/lyte-checkbox.js.msg: A bad interaction between lyte-state and lyte-checkbox was causing the checkbox to change its state even when onBefore callbacks were returning false in firefox. We've added a check in firefox in checkbox to change its state when shift or meta key is pressed. This check was running but the click callback was not running because of the lyte-state attribute. We've made this check to run only when shift or meta key is pressed. Yes the issue is still there but only when shift or meta key is pressed while selecting the checkbox.

There are instances where calculate would fire two items in a row and after construct is fired, which would cause issues because second calculate would use the first calculate's auxArray instead of second construct's auxArray. Fastdom caused this timing issue. So removed fastDom

components/javascript/lyte-radiobutton.j.msg: Added a fix where a radiobutton refused to change state once the onbefore callback returned false.
